price: យើងមិនត្រូវការលាភសក្ការៈពីពួកគេឡើយ ហើយយើង ក៏មិនត្រូវការឱ្យពួកគេផ្ដល់អាហារដល់យើងដែរ។
arabic: مَآ أُرِيدُ مِنۡهُم مِّن رِّزۡقٖ وَمَآ أُرِيدُ أَن يُطۡعِمُونِ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: mā urīdu min'hum min riz'qin wamā urīdu an yuṭ'ʿimūni
